entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
